name: Spirit Swap
description:
IF you find the game difficult try the version with a softer controller : 
https://noxyde.itch.io/spirit-swap-easy

This project was made from zero in 9 days by three persons.

Erin with the Art and Animation

Jean with the Programing 

Shirakawa with the Music and Sound

Everything you see, hear and play has been made in a bit over a week for the Wanna X Yam Jam. Coordinating from the US, Japan and Germany has been a challenge but we are proud of the result !
Hope you have fun with the game!
